Aug. 13, 1870 D Huddersfield Horticultural Show

Greenhead Park, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4287.htm
Horticultural Show and Band Contest - Greenhead Park, Huddersfield The show was well attended. In the afternoon a brass band contest took place, with the following result: 1st prize, Linthwaite Band; 2nd, Dewsbury Old Band; 3rd, Meltham Mills; 4th, Bramley.
Nov. 11, 2011, 3:54 p.m. March 30, 2017, 12:24 p.m.
1 Linthwaite Silver Band Unknown
2 Dewsbury Old Band Unknown
3 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Unknown
4 Bramley Temperance Unknown
